1: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <sup>8605 </sup> <n>A Prayer</n> לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> שִׁמְעָ֤ה <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Hear</n> יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> צֶ֗דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>the right</n> הַקְשִׁ֥יבָה <sup>7181 </sup> <n>attend</n> רִנָּתִ֗י <sup>7440 </sup> <n>unto my cry</n> הַאֲזִ֥ינָה <sup>238 </sup> <n>give ear</n> תְפִלָּתִ֑י <sup>8605 </sup> <n>unto my prayer</n> בְּ֝לֹ֗א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>[that goeth] not</n> שִׂפְתֵ֥י <sup>8193 </sup> <n>lips</n> מִרְמָֽה׃ <sup>4820 </sup> <n>out of feigned</n>
2: מִ֭לְּפָנֶיךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from thy presence</n> מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>Let my sentence</n> יֵצֵ֑א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>come forth</n> עֵ֝ינֶ֗יךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>let thine eyes</n> תֶּחֱזֶ֥ינָה <sup>2372 </sup> <n>behold</n> מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <sup>4339 </sup> <n>the things that are equal</n>
3: בָּ֘חַ֤נְתָּ <sup>974 </sup> <n>Thou hast proved</n> לִבִּ֨י ׀ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>mine heart</n> פָּ֘קַ֤דְתָּ <sup>6485 </sup> <n>thou hast visited</n> לַּ֗יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>[me] in the night</n> צְרַפְתַּ֥נִי <sup>6884 </sup> <n>thou hast tried</n> בַל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>nothing</n> תִּמְצָ֑א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>me [and] shalt find</n> זַ֝מֹּתִ֗י <sup>2161 </sup> <n>nothing I am purposed</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>nothing</n> יַעֲבָר־ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>shall not transgress</n> פִּֽי׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>[that] my mouth</n>
4: לִפְעֻלּ֣וֹת <sup>6468 </sup> <n>Concerning the works</n> אָ֭דָם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of men</n> בִּדְבַ֣ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>by the word</n> שְׂפָתֶ֑יךָ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>of thy lips</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> שָׁ֝מַ֗רְתִּי <sup>8104 </sup> <n>I have kept</n> אָרְח֥וֹת <sup>734 </sup> <n>[me from] the paths</n> פָּרִֽיץ׃ <sup>6530 </sup> <n>of the destroyer</n>
5: תָּמֹ֣ךְ <sup>8551 </sup> <n>Hold up</n> אֲ֭שֻׁרַי <sup>838 </sup> <n>my goings</n> בְּמַעְגְּלוֹתֶ֑יךָ <sup>4570 </sup> <n>in thy paths</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>have not</n> נָמ֥וֹטּוּ <sup>4131 </sup> <n>slip</n> פְעָמָֽי׃ <sup>6471 </sup> <n>[that] my footsteps</n>
6: אֲנִֽי־ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> קְרָאתִ֣יךָ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>I have called</n> כִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תַעֲנֵ֣נִי <sup>6030 </sup> <n>upon thee for thou wilt hear</n> אֵ֑ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>me O God</n> הַֽט־ <sup>5186 </sup> <n>incline</n> אָזְנְךָ֥ <sup>241 </sup> <n>thine ear</n> לִ֝֗י שְׁמַ֣ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>unto me [and hear</n> אִמְרָתִֽי׃ <sup>565 </sup> <n>] my speech</n>
7: הַפְלֵ֣ה <sup>6395 </sup> <n>Shew thy marvellous</n> חֲ֭סָדֶיךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>lovingkindness</n> מוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>O thou that savest</n> חוֹסִ֑ים <sup>2620 </sup> <n>them which put their trust</n> מִ֝מִּתְקוֹמְמִ֗ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>[in thee] from those that rise up</n> בִּֽימִינֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>by thy right hand</n>
8: שָׁ֭מְרֵנִי <sup>8104 </sup> <n>Keep</n> כְּאִישׁ֣וֹן <sup>380 </sup> <n>me as the apple</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>first</n> עָ֑יִן <sup>5869 </sup> <n>of the eye</n> בְּצֵ֥ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>me under the shadow</n> כְּ֝נָפֶ֗יךָ <sup>3671 </sup> <n>of thy wings</n> תַּסְתִּירֵֽנִי׃ <sup>5641 </sup> <n>hide</n>
9: מִפְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>From</n> רְ֭שָׁעִים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n> ז֣וּ <sup>2098 </sup> <n>that</n> שַׁדּ֑וּנִי <sup>7703 </sup> <n>oppress</n> אֹיְבַ֥י <sup>341 </sup> <n>enemies</n> בְּ֝נֶ֗פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>me [from] my deadly</n> יַקִּ֥יפוּ <sup>5362 </sup> <n>[who] compass me about</n> עָלָֽי׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
10: חֶלְבָּ֥מוֹ <sup>2459 </sup> <n>in their own fat</n> סָּגְר֑וּ <sup>5462 </sup> <n>They are inclosed</n> פִּ֝֗ימוֹ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>with their mouth</n> דִּבְּר֥וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>they speak</n> בְגֵאֽוּת׃ <sup>1348 </sup> <n>proudly</n>
11: אַ֭שֻּׁרֵינוּ <sup>838 </sup> <n>us in our steps</n> עַתָּ֣ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>have now</n> [סְבָבוּנִי כ] (סְבָב֑וּנוּ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>make</n> ק) עֵינֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>their eyes</n> יָ֝שִׁ֗יתוּ <sup>7896 </sup> <n>they have set</n> לִנְט֥וֹת <sup>5186 </sup> <n>bowing down</n> בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>to the earth</n>
12: דִּמְיֹנ֗וֹ <sup>1825 </sup> <n>Like</n> כְּ֭אַרְיֵה <sup>738 </sup> <n>as a lion</n> יִכְס֣וֹף <sup>3700 </sup> <n>[that] is greedy</n> לִטְר֑וֹף <sup>2963 </sup> <n>of his prey</n> וְ֝כִכְפִ֗יר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>and as it were a young lion</n> יֹשֵׁ֥ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>lurking</n> בְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃ <sup>4565 </sup> <n>in secret places</n>
13: קוּמָ֤ה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> קַדְּמָ֣ה <sup>6923 </sup> <n>disappoint</n> פָ֭נָיו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>him</n> הַכְרִיעֵ֑הוּ <sup>3766 </sup> <n>cast him down</n> פַּלְּטָ֥ה <sup>6403 </sup> <n>deliver</n> נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> מֵרָשָׁ֥ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>from the wicked</n> חַרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <sup>2719 </sup> <n>[which is] thy sword</n>
14: מִֽמְתִ֥ים <sup>4962 </sup> <n>From men</n> יָדְךָ֨ ׀ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[which are] thy hand</n> יְהוָ֡ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> מִֽמְתִ֬ים <sup>4962 </sup> <n>from men</n> מֵחֶ֗לֶד <sup>2465 </sup> <n>of the world</n> חֶלְקָ֥ם <sup>2506 </sup> <n>[which have] their portion</n> בַּֽחַיִּים֮ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>in [this] life</n> [וּצְפִינְךָ כ] (וּֽצְפוּנְךָ֮ <sup>6840 </sup> <n>hid</n> ק) תְּמַלֵּ֪א <sup>4390 </sup> <n>thou fillest</n> בִ֫טְנָ֥ם <sup>990 </sup> <n>and whose belly</n> יִשְׂבְּע֥וּ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>[treasure] they are full</n> בָנִ֑ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of children</n> וְהִנִּ֥יחוּ <sup>3240 </sup> <n>and leave</n> יִ֝תְרָ֗ם <sup>3499 </sup> <n>the rest</n> לְעוֹלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>5768 </sup> <n>of their [substance] to their babes</n>
15: אֲנִ֗י <sup>589 </sup> <n>in</n> בְּ֭צֶדֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>in righteousness</n> אֶחֱזֶ֣ה <sup>2372 </sup> <n>As for me I will behold</n> פָנֶ֑יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thy face</n> אֶשְׂבְּעָ֥ה <sup>7646 </sup> <n>I shall be satisfied</n> בְ֝הָקִ֗יץ <sup>6974 </sup> <n>when I awake</n> תְּמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>8544 </sup> <n>with thy likeness</n>
